title: The Best TV Character of the Century. Plus: ‘Ozark’ Season 3 With Executive Producer Chris Mundy  | The Watch
description:
The Ringer launched its Best TV Character of the Century bracket today, which led us to debate what makes an excellent TV character (1:09). You don’t need to fully understand what’s happening in ‘Devs’ to know that it’s a great TV show (31:31). And an interview with ‘Ozark’ executive producer Chris Mundy about Season 3 of the show (47:01).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Chris Mundy

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
